Storages.extractStorageName

Function/Meaning
Extract storage name
Type
Method of the Storages class
Syntax
extractStorageName(storage)
Arguments
storage Specifies the storage name from which you want to extract the filename part.
Return Value
Returns the storage name (filename). If no storage name is found, an empty string is returned.
Description
Extracts and returns the storage name part (excluding the path) from the specified storage name.
For example, if "System/hoge.txt" is passed, "hoge.txt" is returned.
Reference
Storages.extractStorageExt
Storages.extractStoragePath
